Title: graphic designer
email_subject: Connecting with a Fellow Creative from International Coach Academy
email_body:
Hi Michelle,

I hope this message finds you well. My name is {name}, and I am a {year} year {degree} student majoring in {major} at {university}. I came across your profile and was inspired by your work as a graphic designer at Live Nation Entertainment.

As someone interested in pursuing a career in {career_interests}, I would love to learn more about your journey and any insights you might have about breaking into the industry. 

Would you be open to a brief chat in the next couple of weeks? I believe your experiences could provide valuable guidance as I navigate my career path.

Thank you for considering my request. I look forward to the possibility of connecting!

Best regards,
{name}

Title: graphic designer
email_subject: Connecting with a Fellow Georgia Tech Graduate
email_body:
Dear Will,

I hope this message finds you well. My name is [name], and I am a [year] student at Georgia Tech majoring in [major]. I have a strong interest in pursuing a career in graphic design, and I admire your work in this field.

As a fellow Georgia Tech student, I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to learn from your experiences and insights. If you have 15-20 minutes to spare in the next couple of weeks, I would love to chat about your journey and any advice you might have for someone starting out in graphic design.

Thank you for considering my request. I look forward to the possibility of connecting!

Best regards,

[name]
